REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0117 reute h f BC-DATAREX-<DRX>-TO-SELL 03-11 0061

TEXT.TITLE: DATAREX <DRX> TO SELL 3M <MMM> COMPUTER GEAR
TEXT.BODY: Datarex Systems Inc said it was named a distributor for Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing Co's data recording media and other computer suppliers and accessories in the United States. The company said sales of the 3M products will have a material impact on its sales for the balance of 1987. Reuter
